profile:
Imagine your home totally organized! At Closets by Design, we work to simplify your life by designing, building, and installing custom closets, garage cabinets, home offices, laundries, pantries, and much more. With a wide selection of finishes, accessories, and hardware, you will get the customized look you have always dreamed of and you can rely on our three decades of experience for total customer satisfaction. profile:
Welcome to The Tailored Closet. Same great company, brand new name. We  specialize in custom designed and installed closets, entryways, mudrooms, home offices, laundry rooms, Murphy Beds and other storage spaces. 

***

Owners Marc and Jill Javet are proud to offer you custom storage solutions tailored to your needs, your space, your taste and your budget -- and our installations are done quickly and professionally. 

***

We carry a large range of finishes, hardware and storage accessories and pride ourselves on our commitment to support you with the most innovative and effective products on the market. Our in-home consultations are always free and include a detailed 3-D design and quote. 

***

We're excited to help you with your next home organization project. 

We're social:

profile:
Looking to upgrade your closets?

Closet Town is here to provide you with what you need to get your clothes, shoes, purses and all other storage needs living and dwelling in luxury.

We build custom fitted closet organizers to maximize your closet space and provide you a completely adjustable beautiful looking closet.
 
Just 4 Simple steps with Closet Town consultation process: Free Consultation Included!!!  VIRTUAL CONSULTATION AVAILABLE!!!
 
First step is for YOU or CLOSET TOWN Representative-  to measure the closet wall widths and heights.
Secondly we strategically design your closet together with your input and ideas to get the best design and Functionality.
Thirdly we price your design outcome through our pricing software.
Finalizing the Order and setting up the Installation date, is then proceeded as the final Fourth Step.

We offer a variety of Colors and Textured 3/4" High Density Melamine (Canadian Made) and accessories to choose from for your closet needs. 

Contact Us To Book Your Free Virtual or  In-Person Consultation.  

***DUE TO Covid-19 ALL IN-PERSON CONSULTATION &INSTALLATION PROCESS CLOSET TOWN PERSON(S) WILL WARE MASKS***

profile:
At Garage Tailors we challenge the status quo in the home organization space, so that we can do our part to help make our clients day a little less stressful.  Our operating principles are trust, honesty, transparency and value.  The experience for our clients must be positive and one that they have to tell their friends about. 
Our philosophy is that every families garage transformation, whether it's solely a floor coating to a full renovation, be designed and constructed to be within an agreed upon budget and schedule, that is how we work with you. From the initial estimate to when we say thank you for your business, we believe that we can meet all your expectations.
We service the GTA and all the surrounding areas.

profile: Good news, homeowners: Replacing your interior doors, closet doors and closet organizers has never been easier or more affordable. One Day Doors & Closets' advanced 3D scanning technology makes it possible to replace your doors and closets for about 50% less than you'd pay using home improvement stores, handymen or contractors. Best of all, we're in and out in less than 4 hours. It's the best 'whole home improvement' you can make, for the cost, turnaround time, and the overall improvement throughout your home. No other project can update the look of your entire home as quickly and affordably without any messy, noisy or intrusive construction. We get in. We get out. You get a whole new look.

profile:
Our company specialized on design, manufacture and installation of all types of closet organizers and kitchen cabinets. 
Our goal is to make your home more comfortable and organized for any space and budget. 
Our top priority is a customer service – we want happy clients! 
And we want you to come back to us again! 
Call or email us today and we will help you to organize your home.

Our Mission
Tired of stepping over the things on the floor ? 
Don't have enough space to put on new clothes and shoes ? 
Can't see the mess in children's rooms ? We can help ! Coziness and comfort - this is what we are here for !

Our Vision
Everyone wants to be at home. But to be in a cozy, well organized home is much more attractive. 
When you have a party with your friends and relatives or sell your house - it always works to make a great impression on people. 
Remember, the coziness and comfort are the main things that everybody is looking for in life. 
You can be in two equal houses, but you will never come back to the messy one. 
Do you want to make your home the place everyone would like to return to ? 
Call us today and we can make it happen !

FOR A FREE ESTIMATE CALL
416-839-8012

profile:
We are specialized in the production of fine kitchen cabinets, custom shelving, and high-end closet storage solutions . We are confident in the products we make, as well as the services we provide, on every project will suit your vision.

20 years of experience
Our 20 years of experience led to remodeling any kitchen, wall unit, home office, or walk-in closet style you like

Whether meeting with you and your family or collaborating with architects, contractors, and interior decorators, we’re here to help you define your scope of work and articulate a vision that’s uniquely yours.


The experienced design team will turn your vision into a reality detailed plan, creating custom solutions that blend form a function to fit all your family’s needs.

Build
Our designs of combining the old and the new world approach to the top of craftsmanship and that mean you can have the best rich design from both worlds for kitchens or bathrooms. We make every piece of cabinetry in our shop in Toronto, Proudly 100% Canadian-made. To this regard, we offer a warranty against defects in materials and/or workmanship for a period of two years under average residential usage.  

Our Values
We believe in building durable and functional cabinetry that will make things easy to store, easy to find, and easy to clean. By choosing to work with us you will get the real value for your investment and your cabinets will look as good up close as they do from a distance.
